addr: Paddington Green Campus,  Paddington green, , London  W2 1Nb GB
title: Conscious Vibes, Natural Hair & Lifestyle Expo 2016
desc: CONSCIOUS VIBES EXPO IS BACK WITH A MASSIVE APPLAUD Are you looking for a stylist to style your hair, or even contemplating making the chop and going natural, then this is the event for you, we have locticians and natural hair salon owners on site, advising and giving you tips on how to manage, care or style your natural hair. Are you looking for natural hair products or natural skin products, and cant find what you want in the high street stores, then come and check out our lifestyle market offering all that is natural and affordable for our skin, with products imported from the continent, made by us for us. Do you love African Fashion, and accessories, we have it all, clothes ranging from small to plus sizes, we cater for all of the family children, partners and of course the ladies. Check out a few short video's from our past expo's 2014 Expo 2015 Expo ? Look forward to meeting you on the day. ? Peace and Love Angela
